skill.name: gepetto
skill.description: Creates detailed, sectionized implementation plans through research, stakeholder interviews, and multi-LLM review. Use when planning features that need thorough pre-implementation analysis.
skill.summary: Transforms vague feature ideas into comprehensive implementation plans through structured research, interviews, and multi-LLM review.
skill.author: softaworks

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation-based methodology skill with no executable code. All 223 static findings are false positives from markdown code fences and shell command examples in documentation. The skill only contains markdown files providing planning guidance to Claude agents.

content.value_statement: Pre-implementation planning often leads to missed requirements and scope creep. Gepetto transforms rough feature ideas into detailed, battle-tested implementation plans through structured research, stakeholder interviews, and optional multi-LLM review.
actual_capabilities: Conducts structured research on technology stacks and approaches
Facilitates stakeholder interviews to gather requirements
Synthesizes specifications from research and interview findings
Generates comprehensive implementation plans with sections
Sends plans to external LLMs (Gemini CLI, Codex CLI) for independent review
Creates sectionized output files ready for execution
limitations: Does not execute code or write implementation files directly
External review requires separate Gemini CLI and Codex CLI installations
Requires markdown spec file input to start planning process
Cannot make decisions without user-provided requirements

use_cases.title: New Feature Planning
use_cases.description: Transform a vague feature idea into a detailed implementation plan with research, stakeholder interviews, and multi-LLM review before writing any code.

use_cases.title: Architecture Review
use_cases.description: Get comprehensive analysis of proposed architecture including edge cases, security considerations, and performance implications from multiple AI reviewers.

use_cases.title: Requirements Discovery
use_cases.description: Systematically uncover implicit requirements and edge cases through structured interview prompts and research protocols.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Planning Session
prompt_templates.prompt: Use /gepetto @planning/my-feature-spec.md to create an implementation plan for my feature. The spec file describes what I want to build.
prompt_templates.scenario: Starting a new feature planning session with a markdown spec file

prompt_templates.title: Resume Existing Plan
prompt_templates.prompt: Use /gepetto @planning/my-feature-spec.md to resume our planning session. We already have claude-research.md and claude-interview.md created.
prompt_templates.scenario: Continuing a partially completed planning process

prompt_templates.title: Detailed Technical Planning
prompt_templates.prompt: Use /gepetto @planning/my-api-spec.md to plan a comprehensive implementation. Include research on similar implementations, stakeholder interviews for requirements, and external LLM review.
prompt_templates.scenario: Planning a complex technical feature requiring thorough analysis

prompt_templates.title: Quick Feature Sketch
prompt_templates.prompt: Use /gepetto @planning/simple-feature.md for a quick planning session. Skip research and external review, go straight to interview and spec synthesis.
prompt_templates.scenario: Creating a lightweight plan for a simple feature

output: Researching authentication patterns and best practices...
What are your user authentication requirements?
Sending plan to Gemini and Codex for review...

best_practices: Provide detailed initial specs to reduce iteration cycles
Use the resume feature to continue interrupted planning sessions
Enable external review for critical features requiring multiple perspectives
anti_patterns: Invoking without a markdown spec file
Skipping the interview phase for complex features
Expecting complete implementation code instead of planning documents

faq.question: What input does Gepetto require?
faq.answer: Gepetto requires a markdown spec file path ending with .md. This file contains your initial feature description or requirements.

faq.question: Can I resume an interrupted planning session?
faq.answer: Yes, Gepetto automatically detects existing planning files and resumes from the appropriate step. Just invoke with the same spec file path.

faq.question: What are the external review options?
faq.answer: Gepetto can send your implementation plan to Gemini CLI and Codex CLI for independent review. Both CLIs must be installed and configured separately.

faq.question: Does Gepetto write any code?
faq.answer: No, Geppetto creates planning documents (research, interview notes, specifications, implementation plans). Code execution is handled by separate skills.

faq.question: What files does Gepetto create?
faq.answer: Gepetto creates claude-research.md, claude-interview.md, claude-spec.md, claude-plan.md, and optional review files in a reviews/ directory.

faq.question: Can I customize the workflow?
faq.answer: Yes, you can skip research or external review phases. Geppetto adapts to your preferences and project requirements.
